analysis.Summary: A Vue 3 functional component that renders a 'like' (heart) SVG icon with two layers: an outline and a filled shape that appears when the 'isLiked' prop is true.
analysis.Purpose: Provides a reusable, customizable 'like' icon for navigation or other UI elements, allowing the fill color and liked state to be controlled via props.

Components.name: IconLike
Components.role: Renders the SVG markup for a heart icon, accepts 'fill' and 'isLiked' props to customize appearance.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.purpose: Defines component props in the <script setup> block.

fill.description: Color value used to fill both SVG paths.

isLiked.description: Controls visibility of the filled heart overlay.

Dependencies: CSS variable --black for default fill color
analysis.Usage: Import the component where needed: import IconLike from 'modules/icons/navigation/IconLike.vue'; then use <IconLike :isLiked="true" fill="#ff0000"/> in your template.
analysis.Notes:
1) No <style> blockâ€”styles depend on SVG attributes and CSS variables.
2) Uses Vue 3 <script setup> syntax.
3) The second <path> element uses v-show to conditionally render the filled state.
4) Purely presentational; no internal state or methods beyond props.
